===Overview===
The '''[[Aztecs]]''' were a Mesoamerican [[Human]] culture that flourished in central [[Mexico]] between 1300 A.D. to 1521 A.D. The tribes grew into the [[Aztec Empire]] a confederation of three city-states established in 1422. The empire was ruled from the capital city, [[Tenochtitlan]] along with [[Texcoco]]; and [[Tlacopan]].{{r|Thor & Hercules: Encyclopaedia Mythologica Vol 1 1}}

==13th century - 15th century==
The Aztecs originated as a nomadic tribe in northern Mexico, arrived in Mesoamerica around the beginning of the 13th century. The Eternals; [[Ajak]], [[Valkin]] and [[Virako]] to Central America and encountered the primitive Aztek tribes They then travelled south to found the [[Maya (Civilization)|Maya]] and [[Inca Empire]]. {{r|Thor Annual Vol 1 7}}
The [[Ajak]] was believed him to be [[Quetzalcoatl (Earth-616)|Quetzalcoatl]] and the [[Incas]] worshiped him as [[Tecumotzin]], Lord of Flight.{{r|Eternals Vol 1 2}}
The Aztecs emerged as the dominant force in central Mexico, developing an intricate social, political, religious and commercial organization that brought many of the region’s city-states under their control by the 15th century. {{r|Thor Annual Vol 1 7}}
The [[Mutant]] conqueror [[Apocalypse]] spent time among the Aztecs worshipped as the god; [[Huitzilopochtli]]. He was honored with blood sacrifices.{{r|X-Factor #24}}
===16th century===
In 1519 A.D., [[Hernán Cortés (Earth-616)|Hernán Cortés]] a Spanish conquistador.{{r|Cable #96}} travelled to the new world.{{r|X-Men: Clan Destine Vol 1 2}} He was accompanied by immortal [[Homo neanderthalensis|Neanderthal]] [[Cole (Neanderthal) (Earth-616)|Cole]],{{r|Cable #96}} [[Clan Destine (Earth-616)|Clan Destine]] member [[Jasmine Destine (Earth-616)|Cuckoo]] and her sister [[Gracie Gamble (Earth-616)|Gracie Gamble]]. {{r|X-Men: Clan Destine Vol 1 2}} Cortez and [[Francisco Pizarro (Earth-616)|Pizarro]]).{{r|Marvel Atlas #1|; [[Spain]]'s entry}} Craving for their gold, Cortez had the Aztec massacred by his army, superior in technology.{{r|X-Men: Clan Destine Vol 1 2}} By 1521, Cortés had conquered Mexico, overthrowing Aztec ruler [[Montezuma (Earth-616)|Montezuma]].{{r|Marvel Atlas #2|; [[Mexico]]'s entry}} The region fell under Spanish rule becoming part of the [[Spanish Empire]].{{r|Marvel Atlas #1|; [[Spain]]'s entry}} 

===19th century===
In the 19th century; [[Jonathan Clay (Earth-616)|Rawhide Kid]] helped a woman rescue her father from temple of surviving Aztes. They collaborate with Xotoc, and masquerades as Quatzoma, using his gun to fool the Aztecs.{{r|Rawhide Kid Vol 1 51}}

===Legacy===
[[Ares (Earth-616)|Ares]] the god of war has a collection of weapons used throughout history one being a gun used by the conquistadors against the Aztecs.{{r|Ares Vol 1 3}}

==Culture==
===Religion===
The Aztecs worshiped as gods powerful extradimensional humanoid beings known as the [[Tēteoh]]. They lived in [[Topán]], a small "pocket dimension" adjacent to Mexico; an interdimensional nexus between Topán and Earth exists in [[Teotihuacán]] in the [[State of Mexico]]. These beings helped the formed the Aztec civilization.{{r|Thor & Hercules: Encyclopaedia Mythologica Vol 1 1}}
The Aztecs believed when they died they went to Realm of the Dead known as [[Mictlan]] the underwold ruler by [[Mictlantecuhtli (Deity) (Earth-616)|Mictlantecuhtli]] or [[Aztlan]] Aztec Heaven.{{r|Scarlet Spider Vol 2 13}}

==Alternative Realities==
===Captain Mexica Universe (Earth-1519)===
A reality where the Aztecs were never conquered by the Conquistadors, and went on to conquer most of the world themselves. Formerly home to [[Captain Mexica (Earth-1519)|Captain Mexica]].{{r|Marvel Zombies 3 Vol 1 4}}

===Supremeverse (Earth-31916)===
[[Richard Alexander (Earth-31916)|General Alexander]] stated; Imagine handing an F-16 to the Aztecs in 1521, when Cortez was at war with them, and instead of learning to fly so they could slice Cortez and his army to shreds, they cut off the wings to use as shields, the guns as clubs, and they take off the wheels because they figured they would look really cool hanging from the temple ceiling.{{r|Supreme Power Vol 1 14}}
